		Question: what did dr josef mengele do
		Answer:
answer:
The answer to this question is:

Josef Mengele conducted experiments on human subjects while he was a member of the Schutzstaffel at Auschwitz. He was known as the "Angel of Death." He conducted experiments on twins and other people including injecting chemicals into their eyes, testing the effects of high voltage on human bodies and conducting experiments on twins and other human subjects. He was killed in a car crash in 1979 in Brazil.
